spec_data.Name: perl-HTML-FormatText-WithLinks
spec_data.Description:
HTML::FormatText::WithLinks takes HTML and turns it into plain text but
prints all the links in the HTML as footnotes. By default, it attempts
to mimic the format of the lynx text based web browser's --dump option.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:05:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: HTML to text conversion with links as footnotes
